text:
Andy Cohen Spills All on The Real Housewives: Craziest Moment, Most Demanding Star and More

Andy Cohen is usually the one asking the questions, but not when E! News is on set. We visited the Los Angeles set of Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen to get the scoop on the Bravo…
